data.name: Train with a large crowd
data.alt: Train with a large crowd of people posed for the photo

data.name: Train by the lake
data.alt: Shows the train passing by some boaters right by the water's edge

data.name: World War 1 Niagara
data.alt: People of Niagara gathered for conscription for the first world war

data.name: Soldiers gathered to board a train
data.alt: Lots of soldiers ready to board the train

data.name: The Soldiers Farewell
data.alt: The soldiers wave out of the train to their families

data.name: Soldiers line up for the train
data.alt: The soldiers in formation as their families look at them from the sides

data.name: A worker stands by the train
data.alt: A train with a worker standing by the front as it extends into the distance

data.name: Horse with baskets of fruit
data.alt: A horse drawn carriage loaded with stacks of filled fruit baskets

data.name: Niagara Farms
data.alt: Farmland with a sizeable barn in the background

data.name: Train Tracks in Niagara
data.alt: A blurry photo of train tracks

data.name: Woman by the Train
data.alt: shows people watching and waiting by the train

data.name: Ice Jam At Queenstone, May 12 1909
data.alt: A large group of men seemingly shoveling ice and snow out from the train tracks, piling higher than any of them stand

data.name: Train with traingoers
data.alt: A train lines the background as some mechanics, a conductor, and the passengers pose for the photo

data.name: Michigan Centeral Railroad Ticket
data.alt: Train pass for Mr. J.de W.Randall, Wife & Dtr. Between all stations until Decemeber 31st 1906

data.name: Niagara, St. Catharines, & Toronto Railway Company Ticket
data.alt: The ticket is valid until December 31st 1908

data.name: A tipped over train
data.alt: A train sideways beside the tracks still running

data.name: People stand by the train wreckage
data.alt: A woman and child stand beside train wreckage

data.name: Men at wreckage
data.alt: Some men stand by the wreckage annoyed as another sits on top

data.name: Front of the train off the tracks
data.alt: A man stands on top of the tipped front of the train
